nodes.text: Zeltros was an astronomical object in the galaxy's Inner Rim that had oceans and beaches with tropical trees. Following a massacre aboard the Sorca Retreat, the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra traveled to Zeltros to take a break from her recent misadventures. While relaxing at a beach, being served a Dantooine ice-twist by a service droid, she was confronted by Tukan, who had been tracking her since she killed one of his affiliates, Dukan. Defiant of his attempt to arrest her, Aphra shot him with a blaster she had been concealing. This aggravated Tukan's accomplices, who drew their own blasters on her.

Zeltros was first mentioned in the Star Wars-themed roleplaying game Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in August 2016. It first appeared in the canon comic Doctor Aphra 13, written by Kieron Gillen, illustrated by Kev Walker, and released on October 11, 2017. Zeltros was originally first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends comic Star Wars 73 written by Mary Jo Duffy and published on March 22, 1983.
